title: Manipulating Arrays with dropRightWhile
description: In this lab, we will learn how to remove elements from the end of an array based on a specified function. The dropRightWhile function will loop through the array and remove elements from the right until the function returns true. The remaining elements of the array will then be returned. This lab will help you understand how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript using higher-order functions.

meta.title: Manipulating Arrays with dropRightWhile
meta.description: Learn how to remove elements from the end of an array based on a specified function using the dropRightWhile function in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, arrays, array manipulation, javascript practice online, droprightwhile, higher order functions, javascript lab, javascript tutor

steps.title: Drop Array Elements From the Right Based on Function
